Gun.Description: Designed to become the latest and greatest of the carbine assault rifles, the ACR is capable of being an exceptional choice in just about any tactical scenario.
Considered to be one of the most reliable assault rifles ever made, this weapon is popular with armed forces on every side of the conflict.
This assault rifle variant maintains the legendary durability of its predecessor, while improving use for close-quarters combat.
A bullpup-type assault rifle. The reloading mechanism is the fastest in its class. Has an attached scope.

A state-of-the-art carbine rifle designed to accommodate various bullet types. While traditionally regarded as a semi-automatic rifle, this model of the CX4 Storm has been upgraded to fire at full auto.
Chosen as the standard-issue weapon by many military legions for its high reliability and accuracy, this assault rifle's bullpup design is widely recognizable.
A bullpup model firearm designed to allow a grenade launcher to be attached. It offers enhanced convenience when firing, as empty cartridges are automatically moved to the muzzle.
This gas-powered assault rifle employs a high rate of fire and is built for ambidextrous users. Built-in scope.
This second generation, gas-powered assault rifle features reduced weapon noise and increased rapid-fire capability.

The Bullpup design of this rifle allows it to be more compact than other assault rifles without sacrificing barrel length. Its portability and use of standard 5.56mm ammo makes it a popular choice for military units around the world.
With strong recoil and a low rate of fire, this rifle may not be the best choice for close quarters assaults, but is perfect for longer distance engagements with its highly precise fire.
One of a new generation of M4 assault rifles, improving upon the standard M4A1. Highly reliable, the M416 performs consistently even in the toughest environments.
Based off of the M416 and chambered with standard 7.62 x 51mm NATO bullets, the M417 is a popular choice amongst soldiers. A shorter barrel makes it easier to battle in close quarters.
This shorter and lighter assault rifle variant is ideal for close quarters combat. Highly adaptable.

The latest model of the M-Type carbine rifle that has been designed for modern battle environments. A Rail Integration System (RIS) and lightweight construction make this Assault Rifle a solid choice in combat.
This next-generation weapon is the standard assault rifle for special forces, chosen for its high accuracy combined with a high fire rate.
A highly precise Swiss-made, gas-actuated rifle. The only drawback of this weapon is its strong recoil.
An ambidextrous bullpup assault rifle perfect for urban combat in the 21st Century. Made of composite materials, the TAR-21's design offers mercenaries a comfortable and lightweight rifle.
This is the latest bullpup model rifle. Although it is similar in appearance to the TAR-21, it was built with the strength and power of a K-2 rifle.
